projects.name: AI-Powered Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Developed a scalable recommendation system using collaborative filtering and deep learning techniques. Implemented with Python, TensorFlow, and deployed on AWS.

projects.name: Distributed Data Processing Pipeline
projects.description: Built a high-throughput data processing system using Apache Kafka for real-time streaming and Apache Spark for batch processing. Deployed on a Kubernetes cluster.

projects.name: Natural Language Processing API
projects.description: Created a RESTful API for sentiment analysis and entity recognition using spaCy and Flask. Containerized with Docker and deployed on Google Cloud Run.

projects.name: Blockchain-based Supply Chain Tracker
projects.description: Implemented a decentralized application (DApp) for supply chain management using Ethereum smart contracts and React.js for the frontend.
